program codeforces_469_A
  implicit none

  integer :: n, levels, level2, level3, count, i
  integer, allocatable :: arr(:), arr2(:)

  read(*,*) n, levels
  allocate(arr(levels))
  read(*,*) (arr(i),i=1,levels)

  read(*,*) level2
  level3 = levels + level2
  allocate(arr2(level3))

  arr2(1:levels) = arr(1:levels)
  read(*,*) (arr2(i),i=levels+1,level3)

  count =0
  do i =1,n
     if (any(arr2 ==i )) count = count +1
  end do

  if (count == n) then
     print *, 'I become the guy.'
  else
     print *, 'Oh, my keyboard!'
  end if

  deallocate(arr)
  deallocate(arr2)
end program codeforces_469_A
